I got this dress for our trip to Tombstone Arizona, I wanted to look a little bit old timey but not like I was in a costume. I tried a few other dresses and this is the winner. It looked really good with a pair of Western booties. The stitching on the waist does go up kind of high but I figured nobody would really notice. Maybe when I have some time out take those stitches out and it'll look nicer. I ordered the medium and I think it just fit, the large probably would have been a little baggy. Overall I'm very happy that I got the dress, I wore it twice on our vacation and it feels really nice to wear, and I think it's pretty.

This dress is cute, but I can’t judge beyond that, as I was unable to wear it. The size chart only lists bust and waist measurements. Since I fall within the range for XXL, I ordered it. While I can, indeed, get it on my bust and waist, I am unable to pull it down over my hips and butt. If you are curvy and fall around the upper limit of XXL in the size chart, don’t order this. It won’t fit if your hips/butt are much bigger around than your waist. Had the size chart included a hip measurement, I could have avoided the disappointment and hassle of ordering this and now having to return it.

评论概述: Poor quality and arrived two days late
评论详情: The dress was scheduled for delivery no later than 8pm Saturday, it arrived Monday afternoon. I had reached out Sunday regarding the late arrival and was told it was on its way but that was the extent of the customer service interaction. Much to my dismay when I tried the dress on it had way too much material around the waist and chest which made it look puffy in a weird way and it smelled funny. I am returning this item.

I bought this dress so we could take some "old fashioned " looking pictures.  I feel like this dress was a good choice for that and adding a hat really completed the outfit and showcased the dress beautifully.  I love the dress and am extremely happy with it!
The dress fit perfect and looks great.

Surprisingly comfortable and good quality material. Grace Karin always delivers. The material feels light and airy, I haven't worn it to a Ren fair yet but I'm hoping it'll keep me cool on the heat.  The dress has a slip on the inside - on the white dress the slip is just barely see-through, but the skirt covering it isn't, so there's no issue there. I decided to keep the dusty rose colored dress and return the white one, since I only need one at the moment, but I tried both on and liked them both a lot.  Length and fit: I'm 5'9", about 230 lbs, and this dress is a half inch to an inch above my ankles; it doesn't feel too short, and I think it will look nice with a cute pair of boots. The material from shoulders to waist is stretchy and very comfortable. Below the waist it flows down pretty straight and easily hides any curves I'd rather not show, without needing shapewear. The sleeves don't stay down if I try to wear it off shoulder, but it's cute the normal way so that's fine.  All in all, I'm loving the feel and look of this dress, and can't wait to get some more accessories and wear it to a Renaissance fair.
Fit perfectly. Normal have a hard time fitting my bust. Great material.

This dress just fits really weird. I wanted to love it but the fabric is very cheap and stiff, too. The color wasn't what I expected but I know that happens sometimes. I got XL so I could pull it off my shoulders, but being my height, it hardly worked out and squeezed my shoulders too much. I also pulled it down under my bust easily (36D) but then it left weird rolls in the fabric. If I ordered down at all, it definitely wouldn't fit my arms or shoulders. Just very strange and not very versatile imo. Returned. 2 stars because it seems sewn well.
Loved this dress. Fit perfectly. I received many compliments.

The dress fit nice however, after a day of wearing it I noticed a lot of issues.  1. The elastic in the sleeves are too tight and it caused red lines in my arms.  2. With a corset on with the dress, upon removing the corset there were bubbles or bumps from the texture of the dress on my skin.  3. The underskirt is a tad too tight and causes sitting to be rough

Finding the right clothing for a specific occasion can make you look and feel better. My wife loves cute dresses and when she was shopping for one recently, she came across this Anna-Kaci Renaissance Peasant Maiden Boho Inspired Cap Sleeve Lace Trim Dress and felt it was the right one for an upcoming event.  As for appearance, this dress is certainly pretty and it’s well made. The fabric mix of approximately two- thirds cotton and one- third polyester is also good, and it feels comfy against the skin. Where the dress loses some points is with the sizing. The sleeves are tight and the elastic is uncomfortable, tight at the breasts and hips.  I got my wife the white colored dress and while it is very vivid and bright, and goes with most anything, in hindsight perhaps the off- white would have been a better choice. It’s a matter of preference, but the white is maybe a little too white. Still, it does match with most anything and that’s a good thing.  A pretty, comfy dress does make an occasion better. This dress is certainly nice to look at and the floral lace accents are attractive. You don’t need a slip underneath, as this is not see- through, which is another plus. The only issue is with the tightness. Otherwise, this is a good dress choice overall.
It's a great length for me at 5 ft tall. I wear it with my over lay corset dress that's split down the middle. (Holy clothing manufacturer.) Renaissance dress love it! Want more colors please.
The dress was just as I expected. Good quality.
